body_html:
Apologies for the long delay!

Thank you for this large contribution!
Can this contribution be released as an external (non-TF) repository rather than being added to contrib? In particular, I don't know of any existing hardware backends that will leverage KMeans quantization's speed up. Additionally, there don't seem to be many dependencies on TF core that make it seem that this would be better off as being a nice, modular, decoupled package.

What do you think? Thanks!

body:
Apologies for the long delay!

Thank you for this large contribution!
Can this contribution be released as an external (non-TF) repository rather than being added to contrib? In particular, I don't know of any existing hardware backends that will leverage KMeans quantization's speed up. Additionally, there don't seem to be many dependencies on TF core that make it seem that this would be better off as being a nice, modular, decoupled package.

What do you think? Thanks!
